title: How to summarize a novel - Quora

response.answer_text: Describe the setting (takes place in the slums of Mumbai), the primary character(s) (pawnshop owner/hustler) and what happens to set the whole thing off (he accepts a plea deal, in which he needs to turn in a high profile crime boss). Next, lightly trace the twists and turns (he falls in love with a girl, only to discover she is the crime boss’s daughter. He recruits a friend, who proves unreliable. The police don’t seem keen to hold up their end of the deal), and then the conclusion (he is killed in a police raid). Address the themes (hubris, betrayal, injustice), but don’t apply values statements (this is a good/bad novel).
